title: Halma plc (OTCMKTS:HLMAF) Sees Significant Increase in Short Interest
description: Halma plc (OTCMKTS:HLMAF – Get Free Report) was the target of a large growth in short interest in August. As of August 15th, there was short interest totalling 111,000 shares, a growth of 19.0% from the July 31st total of 93,300 shares. Based on an average tr…
